menu_items.name: Noodle Bar Wednesday
menu_items.description: A selection of noodles with various toppings and sauces.

menu_items.name: Build-A-Bowl Thursday
menu_items.description: Create your own bowl with a variety of fresh ingredients.

menu_items.name: Fish & Chip Friday
menu_items.description: Classic fish and chips with a crispy batter.

menu_items.name: Buffet
menu_items.description: Buffet with daily beverage and dessert features.

name: Manchu Wok
address: University Community Centre, 1151 Richmond Street, London

menu_items.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
menu_items.description: Crispy spring rolls filled with cabbage, carrots, and mushrooms. Served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Fried Rice
menu_items.description: Stir-fried rice with chicken, peas, carrots, and eggs, seasoned with soy sauce.

menu_items.name: Tofu and Broccoli Stir Fry
menu_items.description: Tofu cubes and broccoli florets stir-fried in a savory garlic sauce. Served with steamed jasmine rice.

menu_items.name: Beef and Broccoli
menu_items.description: Tender beef slices stir-fried with broccoli in a savory oyster sauce. Served with steamed rice.

menu_items.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
menu_items.description: Crispy battered chicken pieces tossed in a sweet and tangy sauce with bell peppers and pineapple.

menu_items.name: Almond Cookies
menu_items.description: Traditional Chinese almond cookies made with almond flour and butter.

menu_items.name: Mango Pudding
menu_items.description: Creamy mango-flavored pudding made with coconut milk, topped with fresh mango slices.

menu_items.name: Jasmine Green Tea
menu_items.description: Refreshing green tea infused with jasmine flowers, served hot or iced.

menu_items.name: Egg Drop Soup
menu_items.description: Classic Chinese soup made with beaten eggs, chicken broth, and a hint of sesame oil.

menu_items.name: Kung Pao Chicken
menu_items.description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with peanuts, bell peppers, and chili peppers in a savory sauce.
